SELECT * FROM TstUser usr
JOIN TstOrgUserRelation r ON r.userId = usr.id
WHERE TRUE
AND ( usr.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%','${keywords}','%' ) OR usr.email LIKE CONCAT('%','${keywords}','%' ) OR usr.phone LIKE CONCAT('%','${keywords}','%' ) )
AND usr.disabled = #{disabled}
AND r.orgId = #{orgId} AND usr.deleted != TRUE ORDER BY usr.id ASC

select usr.id, usr.nickname from TstUser usr where usr.id in ( select relation1.entityId from TstProjectRoleEntityRelation relation1 where relation1.type = 'user' AND relation1.projectId = #{prjId} UNION select relta.userId from TstOrgGroupUserRelation relta where relta.orgGroupId in ( select relation2.entityId from TstProjectRoleEntityRelation relation2 where relation2.type = 'group' AND relation2.projectId = #{prjId} ) ) ORDER by usr.id ASC
LIMIT 10

SELECT usr.*, s.leftSizeDesign leftSizeDesign, s.leftSizeExe leftSizeExe, s.issueView issueView FROM TstUser usr JOIN TstUserSettings s ON s.userId = usr.id
WHERE usr.id = #{id}
